description:
The Balloons are rising away and they contain the coins you need. But some also contain bombs that will hurt you. How will you pop them and collect the coins? Pop n' Catch features numerous levels of play each different from the other. Discover the secret of the level and pop the balloons and catch the coins. But beware the bombs they will hurt you and your chances of continuing to the next level. Game play features us of the accelerometer and the touch screen. Can easily be played on handed. Levels randomly rotate giving you a new challenge every game. Think quick, discover the secret of the level pop the balloons and catch some coins!
*Update 1.0.42* Fixed Game Over Bug, Tweaked game mechanics, faster pace balloons, and the cart moves faster.
